overview: Born in Macclesfield, Cheshire, England, Paul Oldfield is better known by his stage name Mr. Methane. He is a British flatulist or "professional farter" who uses the same technique as 19th century French flatulist Joseph Pujol AKA Le Petomane. In this video you will witness the amazing Mr Methane and his bot-tastic barking bum firing on all cylinders... You may be tempted to say Mr Methane's act stinks...but you'll probably be rolling on the floor in stitches laughing at his lavatorial japery! Those who appreciate this breath of fresh air to comedy will soon be gasping for more...
title: Mr. Methane Lets Rip!
